div.head: DWII - Episode 1 - Shooting Script - 08/07/05 Page 1
div.view: Quiet, dark, creaking, as though the machine has been at rest. A figure walks up the ramp. Pulls down a lever. The chamber comes to life. Light from the walls. The column illuminates. Shafts from beneath the metal floors. At the console, THE DOCTOR. In his element, pulling levers, finding his way around. Same old ship, brand new man.

Outside, the most ordinary day in the world, all concrete and litter, grey skies. ROSE , with her rucksack, saying goodbye to JACKIE and MICKEY, the TARDIS in the background. Rose gives Jackie a hug, Jackie upset. Improvise 'I'll come back soon,' 'Be careful,' cover with incidental music.
THE DOCTOR finds the vital switch. Slams it down. Engines grind; the column begins to move up and down...
The noise of the engines. The light on top of the Tardis flares. ROSE is late, grabs her stuff - a kiss for MICKEY - a quick kiss but a good kiss - and she runs for the door -
ROSE runs in, up the ramp, to the console. THE DOCTOR's more precise with his controls now, but more experimental, a genius conducting a vast orchestra. Big smile from both.

div.head: DWII - Episode 1 - Shooting Script - 08/07/05 Page 2
div.tech: FX: The Tardis starts to fade.
div.view: JACKIE , tearful, walks away before it's even finished. MICKEY watches the box disappear. Not happy, but faithful.
The room pitching - not out of control, but it's a vigorous flight.THE DOCTOR and ROSE steady themselves on the console.

sp.speaker: THE DOCTOR
sp.p: Further than we've ever gone before.

div.view: Tardis doors open, CU ROSE , stepping out. Dazzled. Amazed.THE DOCTOR immediately behind her, loving it.

sp.speaker: THE DOCTOR
sp.p: It's the year five billion and twenty three. We're in the Galaxy M87. And this! This is New Earth.

div.view: Reveal an endless, open vista. High clifftops, edged by rolling greenery, the Tardis parked safely on top. Sun glittering off the vast expanse of ocean. FX: in the sky, huge sun, planets, moons. FX: to one side, a good distance away, a mile or so, a building, a white TOWER, built into the cliff, rising up like a classy, futuristic lighthouse, though taller, wider, more lofty. A green crescent moon-sign on ts side. FX: across the sea, on the horizon, a CITY. The gorgeous, glittering skyscrapers of a massive sci-fi mega- city. It's so beautiful, the Doctor and Rose are laughing.

div.head: DWII - Episode 1 - Shooting Script - 08/07/05 Page 3

sp.speaker: THE DOCTOR
sp.p: Not bad. Not bad at all.

sp.speaker: ROSE
sp.p: I'll never get used to this, never. Different ground beneath my feet. Different sky. What's that smell?

sp.speaker: ROSE
sp.p: Apple grass. It's beautiful. Oh I love this. Can I just say? Travelling with you - I love it!

div.view: WIDE SHOT as he grabs her hand and they run down the grass.
